DevOps Engineer

About Us:
Fast-growing startup seeking a DevOps engineer to help scale our infrastructure.

Requirements:
- 2+ years experience with AWS or Azure
- Strong Linux/Unix administration skills
- Experience with Terraform or Ansible
- Proficiency with Docker and Kubernetes
- Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, CircleCI)

Nice to Have:
- Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana)
- Knowledge of Python or Go for automation
- Familiarity with security best practices
- Experience with infrastructure as code

What You'll Do:
- Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines
- Manage cloud infrastructure on AWS
- Implement monitoring and alerting solutions
- Automate deployment and operational tasks
- Collaborate with development teams on DevOps practices
